65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Enes İbn Malik'ten şöyle dediği rivayet edilmiştir: "Mürninler içinde Allah'a verdiği sözde duran nice erler var!" ayetinin Enes İbn Nadr hakkında nazil olduğunu biliyoruz

chapter.ara-name: باب {فَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ قَضَى نَحْبَهُ وَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ يَنْتَظِرُ وَمَا بَدَّلُوا تَبْدِيلاً}
chapter.eng-name: "Of them, some have fulfilled their obligations (i.e ., have been martyred) and some of them are still waiting, but they have never changed (i.e., they never proved treacherous to their covenant which they concluded with Allah) in the least." (V.33:23)
